name: Questionnaire
title: Questionnaire
description: A structured set of questions intended to guide the collection of answers from end-users. Questionnaires provide detailed control over order, presentation, phraseology and grouping to allow coherent, consistent data collection.

elements.name: Questionnaire
elements.description: A structured set of questions intended to guide the collection of answers from end-users.

elements.name: url
elements.description: An absolute URI that is used to identify this questionnaire when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A formal identifier that is used to identify this questionnaire when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

elements.name: version
elements.description: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the questionnaire when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance.

elements.name: name
elements.description: A natural language name identifying the questionnaire.

elements.name: title
elements.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the questionnaire.

elements.name: derivedFrom
elements.description: The URL of a Questionnaire that this Questionnaire is based on.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of this questionnaire. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

elements.name: experimental
elements.description: A Boolean value to indicate that this questionnaire is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

elements.name: subjectType
elements.description: The types of subjects that can be the subject of responses created for the questionnaire.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date (and optionally time) when the questionnaire was published.

elements.name: publisher
elements.description: The name of the organization or individual that published the questionnaire.

elements.name: contact
elements.description: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

elements.name: description
elements.description: A free text natural language description of the questionnaire from a consumer's perspective.

elements.name: useContext
elements.description: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed.

elements.name: jurisdiction
elements.description: A legal or geographic region in which the questionnaire is intended to be used.

elements.name: purpose
elements.description: Explanation of why this questionnaire is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

elements.name: copyright
elements.description: A copyright statement relating to the questionnaire and/or its contents.

elements.name: approvalDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher.

elements.name: lastReviewDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed.

elements.name: effectivePeriod
elements.description: The period during which the questionnaire content was or is planned to be in active use.

elements.name: code
elements.description: An identifier for this question or group of questions in a particular terminology such as LOINC.

elements.name: item
elements.description: A particular question, question grouping or display text that is part of the questionnaire.
